Expedition myth

By Anonymous on Monday, June 4, 2001 - 05:26 pm:

ive heard that if you hold the X button as your monster goes into ruins to find items on an expadition it makes it find a rare item. i tried it several times and came up with the same crap as always. anything that easy couldn't work and im sorry i fell for it.
